video.title: Andy of Mayberry / T.A.G.S.
video.synopsis: Homespun humor and easygoing Sheriff Andy Taylor are at the center of this nostalgic look at Mayberry, a small town filled with lovable characters.

episodes.synopsis: Opie's housekeeper is off to get married. Andy's Aunt Bee -- who raised him -- is coming to replace her, but Opie refuses to give her a chance.
episodes.title: The New Housekeeper

episodes.synopsis: Andy and Barney are left out of the state police's manhunt, so the two spring into action -- and are caught off guard by the criminal.
episodes.title: The Manhunt

episodes.synopsis: Andy has trouble persuading Jim Lindsey to go to New York -- where he can make his talent pay off -- until a tour band stops in Mayberry for lunch.
episodes.title: The Guitar Player

episodes.synopsis: New pharmacist Ellie Walker incurs the wrath of Emma by refusing to sell Emma her pills. Emma takes to her sickbed and milks it for all it's worth.
episodes.title: Ellie Comes to Town

episodes.synopsis: Andy wrongly assumes that Ellie is out to trap him into marriage, so he tries setting her up with other men to avoid an unwanted wedding.
episodes.title: Irresistible Andy

episodes.synopsis: After Andy talks to Opie about keeping promises, Opie's confused when Andy asks him to break his word and reveal his runaway friend's identity.
episodes.title: Runaway Kid

episodes.synopsis: Barney's self-esteem is at its lowest and he's ready to quit the police force. To build his confidence, Andy and Ellie stage a fake robbery.
episodes.title: Andy the Matchmaker

episodes.synopsis: Andy thinks Opie is squandering his money because he wants to buy his girlfriend a gift. Aunt Bee scolds Andy for not having more faith in his son.
episodes.title: Opie's Charity

episodes.synopsis: A young couple wants to tie the knot. The pair's feuding fathers stop the wedding at gunpoint. Andy decides to end the feud before marrying them.
episodes.title: A Feud is a Feud

episodes.synopsis: The town divides when Ellie runs for city council, with the men cutting off their wives' charge accounts and the women refusing to cook and clean.
episodes.title: Ellie for Council

episodes.synopsis: Ben doesn't want Sam's moonshine to outsell his legal liquor. Andy arrests Sam -- but also arrests his family so they can be together for the holiday.
episodes.title: Christmas Story

episodes.synopsis: A stranger named Ed Sawyer comes to town. The suspicious citizens want Andy to do something about him, but because he's broken no laws, Andy refuses.
episodes.title: Stranger in Town

episodes.synopsis: A Hollywood producer wants to film in Mayberry. Despite Andy's objections, Barney, the council, Aunt Bee and Opie are caught up in the hysteria.
episodes.title: Mayberry Goes Hollywood

episodes.synopsis: Andy reminds Opie that honesty is the best policy. But when Andy and Barney must sell an old cannon, Andy makes up a history for the old gun.
episodes.title: The Horse Trader

episodes.synopsis: Irritated that Andy is teasing her friends about being gossips, Aunt Bee hints that there may be more to a traveling shoe salesman than meets the eye.
episodes.title: Those Gossipin' Men

episodes.synopsis: Andy is picked to be a beauty contest judge. The townsfolk drive him crazy by parading their loved ones in front of him to try to influence his vote.
episodes.title: The Beauty Contest

episodes.synopsis: The Morrison sisters tell Andy and Barney the locations of some stills. But they discover that the Morrisons were just getting rid of the competition.
episodes.title: Alcohol and Old Lace

episodes.synopsis: After being warned about fighting, the Boones are at it again when Barney hauls them in. Andy tries to make the Boones be civil to each other.
episodes.title: Andy, the Marriage Counselor

episodes.synopsis: A promoter is rounding up talent in Mayberry to make an album of folk music. When the townsfolk invest in it, Andy thinks they've fallen for a con.
episodes.title: Mayberry on Record

episodes.synopsis: With Andy away in Centerville, Barney is acting sheriff. When Andy returns eight hours later, he finds half the townsfolk in jail on flimsy charges.
episodes.title: Andy Saves Barney's Morale

episodes.synopsis: "Gentleman Dan" Caldwell is in the Mayberry jail, and in no time he has Barney, Opie and Aunt Bee eating out of his hand with his polite manners.
episodes.title: Andy and the Gentleman Crook

episodes.synopsis: Barney can't seem to express his feelings on his dates with Thelma Lou. After Andy tells her how Barney feels, she decides to make him jealous.
episodes.title: Cyrano Andy

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee leaves town but frets that Andy and Opie won't survive without her. The house is a mess, and they rush to clean up before Aunt Bee returns.
episodes.title: Andy and Opie, Housekeepers

episodes.synopsis: Andy assumes Ellie will be going to the social with him. When he goes to invite Ellie, he meets a doctor who's new in town -- and attracted to Ellie.
episodes.title: The New Doctor

episodes.synopsis: The Women's Historical Society believes the descendant of a war hero is living in Mayberry. Barney deduces that he's the person they're looking for.
episodes.title: A Plaque for Mayberry

episodes.synopsis: State inspector Ralph Case doesn't like what he sees and starts noting violations. He condemns Andy's methods and is ready to recommend impeachment.
episodes.title: The Inspector

episodes.synopsis: When a farmer's daughter isn't allowed to buy cosmetics, Ellie decides to give the girl a few of the items, against Andy's warning about meddling.
episodes.title: Ellie Saves a Female

episodes.synopsis: Ben Weaver wants Andy to serve a foreclosure notice on the Scobeys. When Ben says he's owed the full balance, Andy finds ways to stall the process.
episodes.title: Andy Forecloses

episodes.synopsis: Barney comes to the conclusion that Sam is tending to someone with a bullet wound. Barney and Andy drive to Sam's place to satisfy Barney's curiosity.
episodes.title: Quiet Sam

episodes.synopsis: Barney writes a litterbug a ticket for a man who flees. He and Barney get tangled up, and Barney is credited with the capture of an escaped convict.
episodes.title: Barney Gets His Man

episodes.synopsis: When musician Jim Lindsey returns to town, he starts bragging about the offers he's getting. But Andy soon learns that Jim can't pay his bills.
episodes.title: The Guitar Player Returns

episodes.synopsis: Andy has to tell Opie the courthouse is off limits. But as Opie drifts from place to place looking for something else to do, he finds trouble.
episodes.title: Bringing Up Opie

episodes.synopsis: Sheldon is bullying Opie by forcing him to pay a nickel to pass by his street. As Opie asks for nickels, Andy becomes aware something is wrong.
episodes.title: Opie and the Bully

episodes.synopsis: A lawyer is in Mayberry to work with Andy as a deputy -- which doesn't sit well with Barney, who thinks Andy is displeased with his performance.
episodes.title: Barney's Replacement

episodes.synopsis: Finished fishing, Andy tickets a female speeding driver. When her attitude lands her in jail, she uses her feminine wiles to sway the witnesses.
episodes.title: Andy and the Woman Speeder

episodes.synopsis: Frank Myers lives in a run-down house and is delinquent on taxes. The council evicts him. Andy serves the papers and makes a surprising discovery.
episodes.title: Mayberry Goes Bankrupt

episodes.synopsis: When Barney is taken with a new girl, he and Thelma go their separate ways. Barney dates the new girl -- but things start moving too fast for him.
episodes.title: Barney on the Rebound

episodes.synopsis: Opie meets a wanderer and forms a bond with him. But when he picks up the drifter's bad habits, it's up to Andy to get him back on the right track.
episodes.title: Opie's Hobo Friend

episodes.synopsis: An FBI agent and a photographer recognize Mayberry for having the lowest crime rate. But no one realizes that the two plan to rob the Mayberry Bank.
episodes.title: Crime-Free Mayberry

episodes.synopsis: Barney wants to set Andy up on a date with Thelma Lou's cousin Karen. Andy agrees to meet Karen, and to everyone's delight, the two hit it off.
episodes.title: The Perfect Female

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee hires Mr. Wheeler to help with the flowers around the Taylor home. Although Andy has doubts about Wheeler, Aunt Bee is quite taken with him.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Brief Encounter

episodes.synopsis: Roger Courtney invites Andy to come up to the state capital and be considered for membership. Andy accepts but says he's bringing Barney along, too.
episodes.title: The Clubmen

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee's homemade pickles are terrible, so Andy switches them with store pickles. The plan backfires when Bee enters her pickles in a contest.
episodes.title: The Pickle Story

episodes.synopsis: When Barney is offered the job of sheriff in a nearby town, he and Andy trade jobs for a day as a trial run.
episodes.title: Sheriff Barney

episodes.synopsis: Farmer "Big" Jeff Pruitt comes to town looking for a wife. Unfortunately for Barney, Pruitt chooses Thelma Lou.
episodes.title: The Farmer Takes a Wife

episodes.synopsis: Opie joins a club and is put in charge of the candle used during the meetings. After the bar burns down, the owner accuses Opie of starting the fire.
episodes.title: The Keeper of the Flame

episodes.synopsis: Andy teaches self-reliance and responsibility to a rich man's spoiled son.
episodes.title: Bailey's Bad Boy

episodes.synopsis: When a pretty, young manicurist starts working in Floyd's Barbershop, the men take to the idea in a big way. Their jealous wives, however, do not.
episodes.title: Manicurist

episodes.synopsis: The townsfolk believe that Henry Bennett is responsible for many mishaps. Andy invites Henry to join him for opening day of the fishing sweepstakes.
episodes.title: The Jinx

episodes.synopsis: The state police come to town to catch some payroll robbers. They want Andy and Barney to stay out of the way but end up needing their help.
episodes.title: Jailbreak

episodes.synopsis: Opie enters the 50-yard dash and thinks he'll be victorious. Barney guarantees him a win. When he comes in last, he's dejected and goes home to pout.
episodes.title: A Medal for Opie

episodes.synopsis: The choir director invites Barney to join the choir before realizing that Barney can't sing.
episodes.title: Barney and the Choir

episodes.synopsis: The town celebrates Founders' Day by picking a stranger to be the guest of honor. Unfortunately, the person chosen turns out to be a thief.
episodes.title: Guest of Honor

episodes.synopsis: Andy helps a struggling salesman stay in town.
episodes.title: Merchant of Mayberry

episodes.synopsis: With the jail full, Andy must decide what to do with Otis. Out of options, he takes Otis home with him to serve his sentence under watchful Aunt Bee.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee the Warden

episodes.synopsis: When farmer Rafe Hollister refuses to take his tetanus shot, Andy and Barney try to persuade him to get vaccinated.
episodes.title: The County Nurse

episodes.synopsis: When Andy and Barney travel to Raleigh on business, they help catch a jewel thief in their hotel.
episodes.title: Andy and Barney in the Big City

episodes.synopsis: Clara convinces Aunt Bee she is keeping Andy from finding a wife. When Mr. Goss shows interest in Bee, she fakes attraction and nearly gets married.
episodes.title: Wedding Bells for Aunt Bee

episodes.synopsis: Barney interferes with Andy's new romance.
episodes.title: Three's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Floyd hires a second barber -- who turns out to be a bookie. To catch him and his accomplices, Barney goes undercover as an old lady.
episodes.title: The Bookie Barber

episodes.synopsis: Andy is accused of official misconduct by a big-shot newspaper publisher Andy arrested for a traffic violation.
episodes.title: Andy on Trial

episodes.synopsis: Barney's cousin Virgil visits and makes a mess of everything. Andy instills self-confidence in Virgil after discovering something he's good at.
episodes.title: Cousin Virgil

episodes.synopsis: Town drunk Otis is made a temporary deputy to impress his visiting older brother.
episodes.title: Deputy Otis

episodes.synopsis: When Opie starts talking about his new friend Mr. McBeevee, his description is hard to believe.
episodes.title: Mr. McBeevee

episodes.synopsis: After Andy finds out his new girlfriend's father is wealthy, Barney convinces Andy that the relationship is doomed.
episodes.title: Andy's Rich Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: Mayberry's new mayor doesn't like Andy or the way he does his job.
episodes.title: Andy and the New Mayor

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee leaves town, leaving Andy and Opie to take care of themselves. When Peggy volunteers to cook, Floyd tells Andy that she wants a husband.
episodes.title: Andy and Opie, Bachelors

episodes.synopsis: The mayor calls in an investigator from the state capital to help solve a string of cow thefts.
episodes.title: The Cow Thief

episodes.synopsis: After Andy has an argument with Peggy, Barney tries to console him by setting him up with another girl.
episodes.title: Barney Mends a Broken Heart

episodes.synopsis: Two farmers ignore Barney and make fun of him. Andy tells them a big story about Barney being a coldhearted killer known as Barney the Beast.
episodes.title: Lawman Barney

episodes.synopsis: Mayberry's town band is terrible, and the mayor refuses to allow them to go to the state capital to play -- until Andy gets help from Freddy Fleet.
episodes.title: The Mayberry Band

episodes.synopsis: Floyd has been posing as a rich man in letters to a wealthy widow, and he panics when she visits. But Andy finds out she hasn't been honest, either.
episodes.title: Floyd, the Gay Deceiver

episodes.synopsis: Andy's latest girlfriend is the new county nurse. Everyone likes her except Opie, who's jealous of all the time Andy spends with her.
episodes.title: Opie's Rival

episodes.synopsis: Three escaped women convicts hold Barney and Floyd hostage in a remote cabin.
episodes.title: Convicts at Large

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee wants a pretty bed jacket for her birthday. A mix-up causes Andy to have to sell his favorite fishing pole to get it.
episodes.title: The Bed Jacket

episodes.synopsis: Barney thinks the Mayberry Bank is a pushover for a robbery and sets out to prove it.
episodes.title: The Bank Job

episodes.synopsis: Opie must learn to fight when a new boy in town ridicules him and begins to lead his friends toward a life of crime.
episodes.title: One-Punch Opie

episodes.synopsis: After Barney tickets the governor for illegal parking, the governor congratulates him for doing a good job. But Barney thinks he's going to be fired.
episodes.title: Barney and the Governor

episodes.synopsis: A businessman's car breaks down near town on a Sunday. Andy tries to talk him into staying and getting it fixed Monday, but it's a hard sell -- at first.
episodes.title: Man in a Hurry

episodes.synopsis: Andy receives a letter from an ex-con whom he shot in the leg, saying he's coming to Mayberry to set things straight. Barney assumes the worst.
episodes.title: High Noon in Mayberry

episodes.synopsis: A construction crew is blasting for an underpass near Mayberry. The rumor is that the mayor wants to bring the highway past his brother's gas station.
episodes.title: The Loaded Goat

episodes.synopsis: At his high school class reunion, Andy finds that some connections are never completely broken, and some hearts never completely heal.
episodes.title: Class Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Andy must find a way to appease all sides as the mayor objects when a golden-voiced farmer is chosen to represent Mayberry in a musical production.
episodes.title: Rafe Hollister Sings

episodes.synopsis: Opie's friend Arnold seems to have it all. When the pressure's on, though, Opie learns that Arnold's assets are also his greatest weaknesses.
episodes.title: Opie and the Spoiled Kid

episodes.synopsis: After a series of auto-related thefts, suspicion looms over Jimmy. How long can Andy rush to Jimmy's defense before his faith in the boy is shaken?
episodes.title: The Great Filling Station Robbery

episodes.synopsis: Opie hates history homework and misinterprets Andy's empathy as an excuse to skip it. When Miss Crump holds Andy responsible, he must motivate Opie.
episodes.title: Andy Discovers America

episodes.synopsis: Andy must protect Aunt Bee from a traveling snake-oil huckster whose 170-proof "tonic" provides her temporary relief.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Medicine Man

episodes.synopsis: Andy has his hands full when a musical mountain family descends upon Mayberry.
episodes.title: The Darlings are Coming

episodes.synopsis: Andy's home becomes his castle as he engages the employment of a bicycle-touring Englishman who must work off an unfortunately earned debt.
episodes.title: Andy's English Valet

episodes.synopsis: It's a red-letter day in Mayberry when Barney decides to join the motoring world, but things go sour when his cream puff turns out to be a lemon.
episodes.title: Barney's First Car

episodes.synopsis: When Opie feels too shy to ask Karen to the movies, Thelma Lou boosts Opie's confidence but destroys Barney's. Can Andy realign this love quadrangle?
episodes.title: The Rivals

episodes.synopsis: Everybody's ready for Andy to get married. But could it be that Andy has his own agenda, unbeknownst to Mayberry's meddlesome matchmakers?
episodes.title: A Wife for Andy

episodes.synopsis: It's pandemonium when 11 stray dogs invade the courthouse. Andy and Barney have to figure out what to do with them before a state official arrives.
episodes.title: Dogs, Dogs, Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Ernest decides to court Briscoe's already married daughter. Ernest doesn't see the marriage as legal because it wasn't performed by a preacher.
episodes.title: Mountain Wedding

episodes.synopsis: When the Mayberry jail is needed to house two holdup criminals, it's more than Barney can handle -- especially when he's being "assisted" by Gomer.
episodes.title: The Big House

episodes.synopsis: After Opie kills a mother bird with his slingshot, he raises her babies. He grows attached to them but is forced to set them free when they get big.
episodes.title: Opie the Bird Man

episodes.synopsis: Barney and Gomer try to retrieve a baseball from a supposedly haunted house and find some strange goings on inside.
episodes.title: The Haunted House

episodes.synopsis: Ernest T. Bass causes a ruckus when he decides to join the Army. When Andy and Barney find out why, they are able to solve his problem.
episodes.title: Ernest T. Bass Joins the Army

episodes.synopsis: A visiting preacher tells the town to relax and enjoy the simple pleasures of life. He inspires everyone to have an old-time band concert.
episodes.title: The Sermon for Today

episodes.synopsis: Briscoe decides he's going to marry Aunt Bee. He even resorts to kidnapping her. Andy comes up with a clever solution to the whole mess.
episodes.title: Briscoe Declares for Aunt Bee

episodes.synopsis: After Gomer gets fired from the filling station, he moves in with Andy. When people come by to get their cars looked at, Andy has to do something.
episodes.title: Gomer, the House Guest

episodes.synopsis: Andy and Barney have to protect a shipment of gold on its way to Fort Knox. Barney spills the beans, and within minutes, all of Mayberry knows.
episodes.title: A Black Day for Mayberry

episodes.synopsis: A mistake by Opie's teacher gives him all A's. Everyone is so proud of him that he can't figure out how to break the news without disappointing them.
episodes.title: Opie's Ill-Gotten Gain

episodes.synopsis: Barney has to play matchmaker for Thelma Lou's homely visiting cousin, Mary Grace, and sets her up with Gomer Pyle.
episodes.title: A Date for Gomer

episodes.synopsis: Barney's landlady evicts him quite suddenly. When his landlady then marries someone she just met, Barney suspects she's the victim of a con man.
episodes.title: Up in Barney's Room

episodes.synopsis: Gomer makes a citizen's arrest of Barney for committing the same traffic violation that Gomer did. Barney then resigns and demands jail time.
episodes.title: Citizen's Arrest

episodes.synopsis: After watching a movie about Robin Hood, Opie and his pals befriend a hobo who encourages them to steal from those who have and give to him.
episodes.title: Opie and His Merry Men

episodes.synopsis: After Andy and Helen escape from a collapsed cave, they hear that Barney mounted a rescue team, so they go back in to save Barney from embarrassment.
episodes.title: Barney and the Cave Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Opie's new friend Trey is liked by everyone, but Opie becomes jealous when he thinks Andy likes Trey more than him.
episodes.title: Andy and Opie's Pal

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee organizes a crusade to keep a local man from being evicted because of a highway project, but she doesn't realize he has something to hide.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee the Crusader

episodes.synopsis: Barney buys an old surplus army motorcycle and sidecar to use on patrol, then becomes a menace to the whole town.
episodes.title: Barney's Sidecar

episodes.synopsis: In order to help Ernest find a girl, Andy and Barney teach him some manners. Then they try to pass him off at a party as Andy's cousin from Raleigh.
episodes.title: My Fair Ernest T. Bass

episodes.synopsis: A beautiful young prisoner manages to charm both Barney and Andy.
episodes.title: Prisoner of Love

episodes.synopsis: Otis has Andy and Barney worried when he buys a car.
episodes.title: Hot Rod Otis

episodes.synopsis: Barney is the only tenor in the choir. When a tenor solo part is required and the choir director needs someone else to sing the part, Gomer steps in.
episodes.title: The Song Festers

episodes.synopsis: Ben complains to Andy that merchandise has been disappearing from his store. While Andy investigates, Barney goes undercover to catch the crooks.
episodes.title: The Shoplifters

episodes.synopsis: Andy takes a much-needed vacation, leaving Barney and Gomer in charge. Unfortunately, nobody will let Andy get any rest.
episodes.title: Andy's Vacation

episodes.synopsis: After Andy wakes up Gomer to put out a small fire at the filling station, Gomer dedicates himself to repaying Andy for saving his life.
episodes.title: Andy Saves Gomer

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee buys a side of beef. When she gets it home, the freezer doesn't work right, but she won't pay "the man" from Mount Pilot to come and fix it.
episodes.title: Bargain Day

episodes.synopsis: Charlene Darling uses a mountain ritual to divorce Dud Wash and marry Andy.
episodes.title: Divorce Mountain Style

episodes.synopsis: Opie and his friends get involved in a scheme selling a worthless product called Miracle Salve.
episodes.title: A Deal Is a Deal

episodes.synopsis: Two gals interrupt Andy and Barney's late-night work. Helen and Thelma see them and cancel their dates, so Barney and Andy take the other girls out.
episodes.title: Fun Girls

episodes.synopsis: When Malcolm Merriweather returns to Mayberry, Andy hires him to help Aunt Bee with the housework. She goes from being overworked to feeling unneeded.
episodes.title: Return of Malcolm Merriweather

episodes.synopsis: Barney sees Andy and Helen in the jewelry store sneaking a kiss and tells everyone they are engaged. Aunt Bee throws a big surprise party for them.
episodes.title: The Rumor

episodes.synopsis: After Gomer mentions to Thelma Lou that Barney said he "has her in his hip pocket," she gets angry and starts dating Gomer.
episodes.title: Barney and Thelma Low Phfft

episodes.synopsis: Andy, Barney and Gomer take Opie and his friends camping. Barney, who said he was a great woodsman, manages to get lost in the woods with Gomer.
episodes.title: Back to Nature

episodes.synopsis: Gomer joins the Marines. When Andy finds out the sergeant plans to get Gomer sent home, he must find a way to get the sergeant on Gomer's side.
episodes.title: Gomer Pyle, USMC

episodes.synopsis: Opie develops a secret crush and wants to buy her a present. Andy suggests flowers before discovering that the secret crush is Opie's teacher, Helen.
episodes.title: Opie Loves Helen

episodes.synopsis: Barney has to gain weight and somehow grow taller in order to meet new guidelines for sheriff's deputies or lose his job. Can he do it?
episodes.title: Barney's Physical

episodes.synopsis: The Taylors find that a visit from relatives comes with complications.
episodes.title: Family Visit

episodes.synopsis: Ernest returns to school to win a girl's affection.
episodes.title: The Education of Ernest T. Bass

episodes.synopsis: An old beau of Aunt Bee's returns to court her, but he has an annoying sense of humor.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Romance

episodes.synopsis: Barney tries to train a mutt and then wants to use him to help capture an escaped convict, despite Andy's objections.
episodes.title: Barney's Bloodhound

episodes.synopsis: Barney and Thelma Lou have an argument that leads to other arguments between Andy and Barney, Thelma Lou and Helen, and Andy and Helen.
episodes.title: Man in the Middle

episodes.synopsis: When a tough guy threatens to beat up Barney if he catches him out of uniform, Barney begins to wear the uniform all the time.
episodes.title: Barney's Uniform

episodes.synopsis: Opie finds a change purse containing $50 -- which he'll be allowed to keep if no one claims the money within a week.
episodes.title: Opie's Fortune

episodes.synopsis: Andy considers taking a job in Raleigh and lets Barney take over as sheriff for a day to prepare him for the office.
episodes.title: Goodbye Sheriff Taylor

episodes.synopsis: When Clara has to go out of town, Aunt Bee gets the leading role in Mayberry's Centennial Pageant, but her acting skills aren't quite up to the task.
episodes.title: The Pageant

episodes.synopsis: The Darling family want a husband for Charlene's new baby daughter. Things get complicated when they choose Opie and won't take no for an answer.
episodes.title: The Darling Baby

episodes.synopsis: Andy and Helen go on a picnic but are plagued by constant interruptions from Barney, Goober and others.
episodes.title: Andy and Helen Have their Day

episodes.synopsis: Barney buys a fortune-telling game and lets Opie try it out.
episodes.title: Three Wishes for Opie

episodes.synopsis: After Otis falls down in the sheriff's office, a sleazy lawyer convinces him he would be helping Andy and Barney if he were to sue the county.
episodes.title: Otis Sues the County

episodes.synopsis: Barney tries his hand at real estate. He has a plan that will net him commissions on three sales, but Andy must sell his house and buy another.
episodes.title: Barney Fife, Realtor

episodes.synopsis: While Barney's on vacation, Andy needs to find someone to fill in as deputy. He ends up stuck with Goober -- who doesn't take the job seriously.
episodes.title: Goober Takes a Car Apart

episodes.synopsis: Barney tries to rehabilitate Otis after he rides a cow. Barney arrests Otis when it happens again. Otis leaves town and vows to never return.
episodes.title: The Rehabilitation of Otis

episodes.synopsis: Barney gets a letter that predicts bad luck if he doesn't make copies and send them to friends. He doesn't send any and has nothing but bad luck.
episodes.title: The Lucky Letter

episodes.synopsis: When Andy and Barney get tired of Goober tagging along on their dates, they get him to ask a girl on a date. It proves to be quite a project.
episodes.title: Goober and the Art of Love

episodes.synopsis: Barney decides to run for sheriff when he thinks Andy is leaving Mayberry. When Andy ends up staying, Barney ends up running against him.
episodes.title: Barney Runs for Sheriff

episodes.synopsis: Barney finds $250,000 from a bank heist, then goes undercover to find the robber.
episodes.title: If I Had a 1/4 Million

episodes.synopsis: After Andy is profiled as the "Sheriff Without a Gun," a television team comes to town to research a TV show about Mayberry's sheriff department.
episodes.title: TV or Not TV

episodes.synopsis: Helen gets jealous when a very attractive friend of the family visits the Taylor household for a few days.
episodes.title: Guest in the House

episodes.synopsis: When he finds an old police file detailing an assault between Floyd and Charles Foley, Barney stirs up a hornets' nest by reopening the case.
episodes.title: The Case of the Punch in the Nose

episodes.synopsis: When nobody buys Opie's newspaper, Andy and Barney encourage him to print more interesting stories. So Opie publishes all the gossip from around town.
episodes.title: Opie's Newspaper

episodes.synopsis: After Clara gives Aunt Bee the idea that her presence is preventing Andy and Helen from marriage, Aunt Bee names a married man as her imaginary beau.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Invisible Beau

episodes.synopsis: Two flashy girls from Mount Pilot get a speeding ticket and cause romantic complications for Andy and Barney.
episodes.title: The Arrest of the Fun Girls

episodes.synopsis: A traveling salesman is plagued with bad luck.
episodes.title: The Luck of Newton Monroe

episodes.synopsis: Andy is nonchalant when Helen tells him that Opie isn't doing well in math. Barney, however, thinks Andy's attitude is completely off base.
episodes.title: Opie Flunks Arithmetic

episodes.synopsis: Opie tries to win Andy a birthday present at the carnival shooting gallery but gets ripped off by a pair of hucksters using guns with crooked sights.
episodes.title: Opie and the Carnival

episodes.synopsis: A destitute banjo player fills in for Barney.
episodes.title: Banjo-Playing Deputy

episodes.synopsis: Opie tries to get a job delivering groceries. He competes with another boy for the job, but learns that the boy needs the money to help his family.
episodes.title: Opie's Job

episodes.synopsis: Andy gets jealous when a big-city teacher arrives to work with Helen and ends up spending several evenings with her.
episodes.title: Andy's Rival

episodes.synopsis: Andy gives Malcolm the job of school crossing guard after firing Ernest for throwing rocks at cars. Ernest T. challenges Malcolm to a fight.
episodes.title: Malcolm at the Crossroads

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee and her new beau go out on the town.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee the Swinger

episodes.synopsis: Andy's eager new deputy jails Aunt Bee and her friends for illegal gambling when they have a bingo game at their church bazaar.
episodes.title: The Bazaar

episodes.synopsis: Warren's "ESP" warns that a picnic will be a disaster for Andy and Helen.
episodes.title: Warning from Warren

episodes.synopsis: A movie company is going to make film about Andy, and the Taylors take a trip to Hollywood to see the production.
episodes.title: Off to Hollywood

episodes.synopsis: The Taylors arrive in Hollywood and meet the production team that's making the movie Sheriff Without a Gun.
episodes.title: Taylors in Hollywood

episodes.synopsis: Helen gets upset about a picture of Andy and an actress. Andy goes on a date with the actress. When Helen calls, Opie tells her about the date.
episodes.title: The Hollywood Party

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee wins big on a TV quiz show.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee on TV

episodes.synopsis: Warren's ignorance about cannons helps catch two thieves.
episodes.title: The Cannon

episodes.synopsis: Opie and his friend Tommy have fun with walkie-talkies. They listen in on conversations, but Tommy has a sense of humor that not everyone appreciates.
episodes.title: A Man's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee takes a job at a printing shop. When Andy notices that they print business cards with green ink, he figures out what they're really printing!
episodes.title: Aunt Bee Takes a Job

episodes.synopsis: Clara pleads for a new church organ and Andy gets everyone to pledge money to help buy one, but when the pledges come due, no one wants to pay up.
episodes.title: The Church Organ

episodes.synopsis: After watching a TV show about a suave adventurer, Warren becomes like the character while sleepwalking. When he wakes up, he can't remember a thing.
episodes.title: Girl Shy

episodes.synopsis: Warren tries to cure Otis's alcoholism by introducing him to mosaic art. Otis takes to it and even stops drinking. But he has no artistic talent.
episodes.title: Otis, the Artist

episodes.synopsis: Barney comes back to town for the high school reunion and meets everyone, including Thelma Lou, who has also returned to Mayberry.
episodes.title: Return of Barney Fife

episodes.synopsis: While Barney is back in Mayberry, a convict escapes and heads to Mayberry to get even with Barney for sending him to prison the year before.
episodes.title: Legend of Barney Fife

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee finds her lost antique pin after spending the insurance money. She thinks she stole from the company, but Warren and Goober ease her worries.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: A Wild West show comes to town featuring a wimpy man who is said to be related to Wyatt Earp.
episodes.title: Wyatt Earp Rides Again

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee takes driving lessons from Goober. But she isn't licensed to drive, and when she moves the car for a tree trimmer, she runs it into the tree.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee Learns to Drive

episodes.synopsis: Opie is looking forward to the school party -- until he learns that it's a dance. Aunt Bee teaches Opie some dance steps that are a bit outdated.
episodes.title: Look Paw, I'm Dancing

episodes.synopsis: Andy runs a band of gypsies out of town. They curse the town, saying it won't rain again. When there's no rain for days, the town turns against Andy.
episodes.title: The Gypsies

episodes.synopsis: Goober falls hard for the new waitress at the diner, but she only has eyes for Andy.
episodes.title: Eat Your Heart Out

episodes.synopsis: When Aunt Bee gets a call from her niece asking if she would take care of their baby, she accepts. But the baby cries every time Bee picks her up.
episodes.title: A Baby in the House

episodes.synopsis: Andy and Helen try their matchmaking skills on Howard Sprague and Miss Fairchild. They find out Howard's mother keeps him on a very short leash.
episodes.title: The County Clerk

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee is asked to star in a commercial for Foster's Furniture Polish.
episodes.title: Foster Lady

episodes.synopsis: Goober's girlfriend, Flora, fills in for him at the gas station. When Wally sees how she brings in the customers, he fires Goober and hires Flora.
episodes.title: Goober's Replacement

episodes.synopsis: Opie causes a stir in town when he writes a school paper on the historic Battle of Mayberry. He finds that the truth does not match the legend.
episodes.title: Battle of Mayberry

episodes.synopsis: A singer performs a song that Aunt Bee and Clara wrote on his TV show. Unfortunately, his version of the song does not meet with their approval.
episodes.title: A Singer in Town

episodes.synopsis: Helen's visiting niece, Cynthia, feigns helplessness to charm Opie, even though she is athletically superior to him.
episodes.title: Opie's Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: When Andy nominates Howard for membership in the local lodge, Howard's mother tries to prevent it by spreading a false rumor.
episodes.title: The Lodge

episodes.synopsis: When Howard becomes unavailable to sing in a barbershop quartet contest, Andy reluctantly drafts a prisoner to fill in.
episodes.title: Barbershop Quartet

episodes.synopsis: Andy is drafted to umpire a baseball game and is shunned by the entire town when his call causes Mayberry to lose.
episodes.title: The Ballgame

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee shocks the town with her new blond wig and becomes the object of a visiting minister's attention.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Crowning Glory

episodes.synopsis: The Darlings sell some land to the county. Briscoe decides it's time to get his boys married off, and they spend the day in town looking for brides.
episodes.title: The Darling Fortune

episodes.synopsis: After Goober is involved in a minor traffic accident, Floyd and Aunt Bee convince him he has whiplash.
episodes.title: Mind Over Matter

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee and Howard Sprague both run for the same seat on the town council.
episodes.title: Politics Begins at Home

episodes.synopsis: Helen and her students try to close the generation gap by showing that today's kids are no different than yesterday's.
episodes.title: The Senior Play

episodes.synopsis: Opie and Arnold find an abandoned baby on the courthouse steps. Afraid that it will be sent to an orphanage, they try to find a home for it.
episodes.title: Opie Finds a Baby

episodes.synopsis: After beginner angler Howard lands legendary carp "Old Sam," he discovers he has spoiled fishing for everyone by catching The Big One.
episodes.title: Big Fish in a Small Town

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee has a rose that she thinks will finally win her first place in the annual Garden Club contest -- until Opie accidentally destroys it.
episodes.title: Only a Rose

episodes.synopsis: Otis and Howard try to rescue Andy when he is held captive by two desperate bank robbers on the run.
episodes.title: Otis the Deputy

episodes.synopsis: Goober annoys everyone when he becomes convinced his new beard makes him an intellectual.
episodes.title: Goober Makes History

episodes.synopsis: Mayberry has a new doctor in town who runs into difficulty being accepted because no one wants to be his first patient.
episodes.title: New Doctor in Town

episodes.synopsis: A slick con man comes to town and dupes several people, including Andy.
episodes.title: Don't Miss a Good Bet

episodes.synopsis: Three friends cook three different dinners for Andy in one night.
episodes.title: Dinner at Eight

episodes.synopsis: Andy takes a trip to Raleigh to visit Barney and ends up making him a hero by solving a series of robberies.
episodes.title: A Visit to Barney Fife

episodes.synopsis: Barney sees a movie star he used to date in Mayberry. When Barney gets to escort her to her movie's premiere, he thinks he's rekindled an old romance.
episodes.title: Barney Comes to Mayberry

episodes.synopsis: Helen gets jealous when an old girlfriend of Andy's returns to Mayberry.
episodes.title: Andy's Old Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee enters the business world when she becomes part owner of a Chinese restaurant.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: Floyd decides to close the barbershop after Howard buys the building and raises the rent.
episodes.title: Floyd's Barbershop

episodes.synopsis: After the town has a statue made honoring a heroic Taylor ancestor, they find out he was a swindler.
episodes.title: The Statue

episodes.synopsis: Andy gets jealous when a publisher buys Helen's book for children.
episodes.title: Helen, the Authoress

episodes.synopsis: When the milkman buys a truck, he asks Opie to care for his old delivery horse, Dolly. After Dolly refuses to eat, they figure out what's wrong.
episodes.title: Goodbye, Dolly

episodes.synopsis: Opie's piano lessons clash with football practice.
episodes.title: Opie's Piano Lesson

episodes.synopsis: Howard does a comedy act on a TV amateur hour, telling jokes about the people in Mayberry. The townsfolk get upset when they take the jokes seriously.
episodes.title: Howard, the Comedian

episodes.synopsis: Howard volunteers to be a boy's "Big Brother" but gets distracted by the boy's pretty older sister.
episodes.title: Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: Andy's feelings are hurt when Opie doesn't pick him as the subject of a term paper.
episodes.title: Opie's Most Unforgettable Character

episodes.synopsis: Goober holds a contest at the filling station, but an error at the printer's causes one coupon to be worth $200 instead of $10 or less.
episodes.title: Goober's Contest

episodes.synopsis: Opie's date for Arnold's big birthday party cancels at the last minute to go with a "cooler" guy.
episodes.title: Opie's First Love

episodes.synopsis: Howard fills in on the bowling team and amazes everyone with his skill.
episodes.title: Howard the Bowler

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee wins a trip to Mexico and takes Clara and Myrtle. When they get back, they aren't even speaking to each other.
episodes.title: A Trip to Mexico

episodes.synopsis: Andy has to break a date with Helen to go meet with a lawyer, who turns out to be a pretty blonde. Andy lies to Helen about it, but she finds out.
episodes.title: Andy's Trip to Raleigh

episodes.synopsis: Opie makes friends with a rich boy. When they attend a father-son gathering, Andy finds himself acting high-class -- just like he told Opie not to do.
episodes.title: Opie Steps Up in Class

episodes.synopsis: Howard finds romance with a new girl in town, Millie Hutchins. However, her ex-boyfriend Clyde threatens to beat him up if they don't stop dating.
episodes.title: Howard's Main Event

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee serves jury duty.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee, the Juror

episodes.synopsis: Opie and Arnold record a prisoner telling the whereabouts of the money from a bank robbery.
episodes.title: Tape Recorder

episodes.synopsis: After Opie joins a rock band, he starts to stay out late and gets F's in all of his schoolwork. Aunt Bee has Clara talk to him about the situation.
episodes.title: Opie's Group

episodes.synopsis: Clara has eyes for a visiting professor, but he falls hard for Aunt Bee. She finds out why when he begins to constantly compare her to his late wife.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee and the Lecturer

episodes.synopsis: To pay for Opie's college tuition, Andy opens a laundromat to earn extra money. But the business takes up more of his time than he thought it would.
episodes.title: Andy's Investment

episodes.synopsis: Howard and Millie decide to get married. On a train trip to Millie's hometown, they discover they might not be as compatible as they had thought.
episodes.title: Howard and Millie

episodes.synopsis: Andy discovers that Aunt Bee's globe-trotting millionaire cousin is actually a hobo and tries to keep the truth from Aunt Bee and everyone else.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Cousin

episodes.synopsis: Goober takes over at the sheriff's office while Andy has the flu.
episodes.title: Suppose Andy Gets Sick

episodes.synopsis: After seeing a travelogue about island life on TV, Howard quits his job to become a beachcomber in the Caribbean.
episodes.title: Howard's New Life

episodes.synopsis: Goober hears that Wally has the gas station up for sale. With Andy and Emmett as co-signers, Goober is soon the proud owner of his own business.
episodes.title: Goober, the Executive

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee hosts a cooking show, but Andy and Opie suffer at suppertime.
episodes.title: The Mayberry Chef

episodes.synopsis: Emmett's wife pressures him into becoming an insurance salesman, just like his successful brother-in-law.
episodes.title: Emmett's Brother-in-Law

episodes.synopsis: Opie gets a job working at the drugstore and learns that everyone makes mistakes.
episodes.title: Opie's Drug Store Job

episodes.synopsis: A $500 donation to the church causes conflict.
episodes.title: The Church Benefactors

episodes.synopsis: When Barney hears about a summit meeting, he volunteers the home of a wealthy Mayberry citizen. But the homeowner refuses to let them use his house.
episodes.title: Barney Hosts a Summit Meeting

episodes.synopsis: Goober tags along to an auto show, confident of free samples when salesmen learn he's a "big operator." Goober brags that he has a chain of stations.
episodes.title: Goober Goes to the Auto Show

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Bee takes flying lessons, but doesn't feel ready to fly solo.
episodes.title: Aunt Bee's Big Moment

episodes.synopsis: It seems that Helen was once a gangster's moll when she lived in Kansas City.
episodes.title: Helen's Past

episodes.synopsis: Emmett wants to buy Martha a mink coat from Flora's friend. When he and Flora go to get it, Martha sees them and thinks they're having an affair.
episodes.title: Emmett's Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: Howard decides to become a "swinging bachelor" after his mother gets married and moves to Mount Pilot.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Sam Jones runs against Emmett for a seat on the Town Council.
episodes.title: Sam for Town Council

episodes.synopsis: Opie helps Mike learn how to deal with a bully at school.
episodes.title: Opie and Mike

episodes.synopsis: A new dating service with a matchmaking questionnaire focuses on Mayberry -- and soon Goober is filling out the questionnaire erroneously.
episodes.title: A Girl for Goober

episodes.synopsis: Sam's friend Mario and his family come to help on the farm. When they have difficulty adjusting to Mayberry, Sam wonders whether they should stay.
episodes.title: Mayberry RFD
